捏っち上げ: (でっちあげ) - fabrication; put-up job; trumped-up story; frame-up; hoax
捏っち上げる: (でっちあげる) - to fabricate/to invent/to make up (a story)/to hoax/to pull a hoax; to cobble up/to put together in a hurry
捏ね: (つくね) - chicken or fish meatloaf made with egg
捏ねくり回す: (こねくりまわす) - to knead; to turn
捏ねくり返す: (こねくりかえす) - to tamper/to mess with; to go on endlessly
捏ねる: (こねる) - to knead/to mix with fingers; to quibble/to argue for argument's sake
捏ね上げる: (こねあげる) - to knead thoroughly/to work up; to concoct/to make up
捏ね回す: (こねまわす) - to knead; to mix; to complicate; to turn into a mess
捏ね返す: (こねかえす) - to knead; to mix; to complicate; to turn into a mess
捏回す: (こねまわす) - to knead; to mix; to complicate; to turn into a mess
捏返す: (こねかえす) - to knead; to mix; to complicate; to turn into a mess
捏造: (ねつぞう) - fabrication; forgery; falsehood; hoax
捏造記事: (ねつぞうきじ) - (yoji) fabricated story; cooked up (news) report
捕える: (とらえる) - to seize/to capture/to arrest; to grasp/to perceive/to treat (as)
捕まえる: (つかまえる) - to catch; to arrest; to seize
捕まる: (つかまる) - (usu. 捕まる) to be caught/to be arrested; (usu. 掴まる) to hold on to/to grasp; to find (e.g. proof)/to get (e.g. a taxi); to be detained by
捕らえる: (とらえる) - to seize/to capture/to arrest; to grasp/to perceive/to treat (as)
捕らえ処: (とらえどころ) - clue; vital point
捕らえ所のない: (とらえどころのない) - subtle; elusive; slippery
捕らえ所の無い: (とらえどころのない) - subtle; elusive; slippery
捕らぬ狸の皮算用: (とらぬたぬきのかわざんよう) - (proverb) don't count your chickens before they're hatched; counting raccoon dog skins before they have been caught
捕らわれた考え: (とらわれたかんがえ) - prejudiced opinion; conventional ideas
捕らわれる: (とらわれる) - to be caught/to be captured/to be taken prisoner/to be arrested/to be apprehended; to be seized with (fear, etc.)/to be a slave to/to stick to/to adhere to/to be swayed by
捕り手: (とりて) - policeman/official in charge of imprisoning offenders; art of defeating (and capturing) an opponent with one's bare hands
捕り方: (とりかた) - constable; method of catching criminals
捕り物: (とりものちょう) - detective story (esp. one from the Edo period featuring thief-takers); detective's memoirs/thief taker's memoirs
捕り縄: (とりなわ) - rope for tying criminals
捕る: (とる) - to take; to catch; to capture
捕れる: (とれる) - to be caught/to be captured; to be able to catch/to be able to capture
捕われる: (とらわれる) - to be caught/to be captured/to be taken prisoner/to be arrested/to be apprehended; to be seized with (fear, etc.)/to be a slave to/to stick to/to adhere to/to be swayed by
捕出: (ちゅうしゅつ) - extraction/abstraction; selection (from a group)/sampling/eduction
捕捉: (hosoku) - captura, apreensão, preensão, armadilha; compreensão, entendimento, domínio
捕方: (とりかた) - constable; method of catching criminals
捕物帖: (とりものちょう) - detective story (esp. one from the Edo period featuring thief-takers); detective's memoirs/thief taker's memoirs
捕物帳: (とりものちょう) - detective story (esp. one from the Edo period featuring thief-takers); detective's memoirs/thief taker's memoirs
捕虜収容所: (ほりょしゅうようじょ) - prison camp; concentration camp; prisoner of war camp; POW camp
捕虫網: (ほちゅうあみ) - insect net; butterfly net
捕逸: (ほいつ) - {baseb} passed ball; catcher missing a ball
捕食: (ほしょく) - predation; eating prey; preying upon
捕鯨問題: (ほげいもんだい) - whaling controversy; whaling issue
捗々しい: (はかばかしい) - quick; rapid; swift; satisfactory
捗が行く: (はかがゆく) - to make progress; to move right ahead (with the work); to advance
捗る: (hakadoru) - to make progress, to move right ahead (com o trabalho), to advance
捗捗しい: (はかばかしい) - quick; rapid; swift; satisfactory
捜しだす: (さがしだす) - to track down; to locate; to find out; to smoke out; to ferret out; to chase up; to discover
捜し出す: (さがしだす) - to track down; to locate; to find out; to smoke out; to ferret out; to chase up; to discover
捜し回る: (さがしまわる) - to search about for; to hunt around for; to look high and low for; to look everywhere for
捜し当てる: (さがしあてる) - to find out; to discover; to detect
捜し求める: (さがしもとめる) - to search for; to seek for; to look for
捜す: (さがす) - (esp. 探す) to search (for something desired, needed)/to look for; (esp. 捜す) to search (for something lost)/to seek (a suspect in a crime)
捜査: (sousa) - search (especialmente em investigações criminais), investigation, inquiry, enquiry
捜査主任: (そうさしゅにん) - chief investigator; head of the investigation; lead investigator
捜査令状: (そうされいじょう) - search warrant
捜査員: (そうさいん) - investigator (usu. of criminal cases)
捜査当局: (そうさとうきょく) - investigating authorities; law enforcement authority
捜査権: (そうさけん) - right to investigate; investigatory power
捜査課: (そうさか) - criminal investigation department; CID; criminal investigation section
捜索: (sousaku) - search (especialmente para alguém ou algo que está faltando), manhunt; legally authorized search of a person, building, etc.
捜索願: (そうさくねがい) - request for a police search; application to the police to search for a missing person
捜索願い: (そうさくねがい) - request for a police search; application to the police to search for a missing person
捥ぎ取る: (もぎとる) - to pluck off (esp. by twisting)/to pick/to break off/to tear off; to wrest (away from)/to wrench free/to snatch (away)
捥ぐ: (もぐ) - to pluck (usually from a tree); to pick (e.g. apples)
捥げる: (もげる) - to be torn off; to come off
捥る: (もぎる) - to pluck (e.g. a fruit, a leaf); to pick; to tear off (e.g. a ticket stub, a branch from a tree)
捧ぐ: (ささぐ) - to lift up; to give; to offer; to consecrate; to devote; to sacrifice; to dedicate
捧げる: (ささげる) - to lift up; to give; to offer; to consecrate; to devote; to sacrifice; to dedicate
捧げ持つ: (ささげもつ) - to hold something reverently with both hands
